chain.title: Chain Maintenance
steps: Apply degreaser to a clean rag.
Hold the rag over the chain and pedal backward.
Apply a drop of lube to each link.
Wipe off excess lube with a dry cloth.

pedal.title: Removing/Replacing Pedals
steps: Identify the right and left pedals (Left is reverse-threaded!).
Turn toward the back of the bike to loosen.
Grease the threads before installing new ones.

derailleur.title: Adjusting the Rear Derailleur
steps: Turn the barrel adjuster to align the pulley with the gear.
Check limit screws to prevent chain drops.
